title: (x) typefaces used for upcoming Miami Vice film - DIN MIttelschrift, Futura {Jesse Burgheimer}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114175012im_/http:/typophile.com/files/miami_vice_1_800_6463.jpg)

need some help identifying the typefaces...
author: b0sstycoon

comments.content:
DIN Mittelschrift and Futura, respectively.

I kind of wish they'd gone more "80s" by using Broadway:  
 [http://images.amazon.com/images/P/B00005JLEY.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114175012/http:/images.amazon.com/images/P/B00005JLEY.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg "http://images.amazon.com/images/P/B00005JLEY.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg")

But maybe I'm just being nostolgic. I like how Michael Mann is directing, seeing as how he was the executive producer of the original series.
